In all the following examples the input will be of the form

left---\fbox{\includegraphics{graphicx-a}}---right

With different options supplied to \includegraphics.

No optional argument.
left——right

graphics:\scalebox{0.5}{\includegraphics{graphicx-a}}
graphicx:\includegraphics[scale=.5]{graphicx-a}
left——right

graphics:\includegraphics[15,10][35,45]{graphicx-a}}
graphicx:\includegraphics[viewport= 15 10 35 45]{graphicx-a}
left——right

graphics:\includegraphics*[15,10][35,45]{graphicx-a}}
graphicx:\includegraphics[viewport= 15 10 35 45,clip]{graphicx-a}
left——right

graphics:\scalebox{0.5}{\includegraphics{graphicx-a}} and draft option.
graphicx:\includegraphics[scale=.5, draft]{graphicx-a}
left——right

Generated by LaTeXML
